values: A God-Entranced Vision of All Things: Why We Need Jonathan Edwards 300 Years LaterA God-Entranced Vision of All Things: Why We Need Jonathan Edwards 300 Years Later

In our increasingly God-ignoring world, Edwards' voice calls us to behold the glory of the Alpha and the Omega. In our increasingly God-ignoring world, Edwards' voice calls us to behold the glory of the Alpha and the Omega.
